attributes.action: People of the UK to be able to choose the colour of their UK passport.
attributes.additional_details: Maroon passport for those that wish to still identify as European and a blue passport for the people that do not want to identify as European.
attributes.background: The UK is strongly divided and current polls show that 60% of people disagree with Brexit. The colour of peoples passports is very important and many people still wish to identify with the EU therefore people should be able to choose the colour of their passport..
